name: fovea
description: Fovea is a tool for generating tiny, incredibly powerful Web Components.

scripts.generate:readme: scaffold readme --blacklist intro,description,usage && lerna run generate:readme
scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:license & npm run generate:contributing & npm run generate:coc & npm run generate:readme
scripts.update: npm run update:packages && npm run update:shared
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.finalize: NODE_ENV=production npm run bootstrap && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run validate && npm run generate:all && git add . && (git commit -am 'Bumped version' && git push) || true
scripts.publish:patch: npm run finalize && NODE_ENV=production lerna publish patch --conventional-commits --yes --force-publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run finalize && NODE_ENV=production lerna publish minor --conventional-commits --yes --force-publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run finalize && NODE_ENV=production lerna publish major --conventional-commits --yes --force-publish
